Verses: 1 oru Thoodhan Paadhaalaththin Thiravukolaiyum Periya Sangiliyaiyum Than Kaiyile Pidiththukkondu Vaanaththilirundhirangivarakkanden.

2 pisaasendrum Saaththaanendrum Sollappatta Pazhaiya Paambaagiya Valusarppaththai Avan Pidiththu, Adhai Aayiram Varushamalavung Kattivaiththu, Andha Aayiram Varusham Niraiverumvaraikkum Adhu Janangalai Mosampokkaadhapadikku Adhaip Paadhaalaththile Thalliyadaiththu, Adhinmel Muththiraipottaan.

4 andriyum, Naan Singaasanangalaik Kanden; Avaigalinmel Utkaarndhaargal; Niyaayaththeerppuk Kodukkumpadi Avargalukku Adhigaaram Alikkappattadhu. Yesuvaippatriya Saatchiyinimiththamum Dhevanudaiya Vasanaththinimiththamum Sirachchedhampannappattavargaludaiya Aaththumaakkalaiyum, Mirugaththaiyaavadhu Adhin Soroobaththaiyaavadhu Vanangaamalum Thangal Netriyilum Thangal Kaiyilum Adhin Muththiraiyaith Thariththukkollaamalum Irundhavargalaiyum Kanden. Avargal Uyirththu Kiristhuvudanekooda Aayiram Varusham Arasaandaargal.
5 maranamadaindha Matravargal Andha Aayiram Varusham Mudiyumalavum Uyiradaiyavillai. Idhuve Mudhalaam Uyirththezhudhal.

6 mudhalaam Uyirththezhudhalukkup Pangullavan Baakkiyavaanum Parisuththavaanumaayirukkiraan; Ivargalmel Irandaam Maranaththirku Adhigaaramillai. Ivargal Dhevanukkum Kiristhuvukkum Munbaaga, Aasaariyaraayirundhu, Avarodekooda Aayiram Varusham Arasaaluvaargal.
7 andha Aayiram Varusham Mudiyumpodhu Saaththaan Than Kaavalilirundhu Vidudhalaiyaagi,

8 boomiyin Naangu Thisaigalilumulla Jaadhigalaagiya Kogaiyum Maakogaiyum Mosampokkumpadikkum, Avargalai Yuththaththirkuk Koottikkollumpadikkum Purappaduvaan; Avargaludaiya Thogai Kadarkarai Manalaththanaiyaayirukkum.

9 avargal Boomiyengum Parambi, Parisuththavaangaludaiya Paalaiyaththaiyum, Piriyamaana Nagaraththaiyum Valaindhukondaargal; Appozhudhu Dhevanaal Vaanaththilirundhu Akkini Irangi Avargalaip Patchiththuppottadhu.

10 melum Avargalai Mosampokkina Pisaasaanavan, Mirugamum Kallaththeerkkadharisiyumirukkira Idamaagiya Akkiniyum Gandhagamumaana Kadalile Thallappattaan. Avargal Iravum Pagalum Sadhaakaalangalilum Vaadhikkappaduvaargal.
11 pinbu, Naan Periya Vellaich Singaasanaththaiyum Adhinmel Veetrirukkiravaraiyum Kanden; Avarudaiya Samugaththilirundhu Boomiyum Vaanamum Agandrupoyina; Avaigalukku Idangaanappadavillai.

12 mariththoraagiya Siriyoraiyum Periyoraiyum Dhevanukku Munbaaga Nirkakkanden; Appozhudhu Pusthagangal Thirakkappattana; Jeevapusthagam Ennum Veroru Pusthagamum Thirakkappattadhu; Appozhudhu Andhap Pusthagangalil Ezhudhappattavaigalinbadiye Mariththor Thangal Thangal Kiriyaigalukkuththakkadhaaga Niyaayaththeerppadaindhaargal.
13 samuththiram Thannilulla Mariththorai Oppuviththadhu; Maranamum Paadhaalamum Thangalilulla Mariththorai Oppuviththana. Yaavarum Thangal Thangal Kiriyaigalinpadiye Niyaayaththeerppadaindhaargal.
14 appozhudhu Maranamum Paadhaalamum Akkinikkadalile Thallappattana. Idhu Irandaam Maranam.
15 jeevapusthagaththile Ezhudhappattavanaagak Kaanappadaadhavanevano Avan Akkinikkadalile Thallappattaan.
